# vol

Displays Options Strike Volume can add EXP date for bigger breakdown

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/vol ticker [expiry]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |
| expiry | Expiration Date (optional) | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/vol AMD
```

```
/vol AMD 2022-07-29
```
---
